rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0001
rows.name:
Be careful.
Fons Maim is quite a long way off.

rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0002
rows.name:
The monsters are tough, too.
Make sure you're well-prepared before you go.

rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0003
rows.name:
But if you're in a pinch,
just follow the Boss's orders.
I'm sure everything will work out fine.
